oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Stereoselective Synthesis of Substituted 1,4-Oxazepanes by Intramolecular Reductive Etherification
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GHARPURE, SJ
PRASAD, JVK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Heterocycles
Reductive etherification
Lewis acids
Diastereoselectivity
VINYLOGOUS CARBONATES
FUNCTIONALIZED MORPHOLINES
RING-SYSTEM
DERIVATIVES
CONSTRUCTION
BATRACHOTOXIN
CYCLIZATION
OXAZEPANES
MODEL
ACID
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A facile and general strategy is developed for the stereoselective synthesis of substituted 1,4-oxazepane derivatives through an intramolecular reductive etherification reaction. The effects of the substituents present on the oxonium ion and the position of this ion with respect to the nitrogen atom on the yield and selectivity of the reaction are also studied.
